title: OCG LittleKazNz's Birthday Wish!
body:
Hello!

Today is my birthday, I hope Riot can grant my wish <3

I heard noises from the Poro in Braum's release video....... BUT

Can I please have more elaboration on the noises a Poro makes? (I got a soft toy one and my partner and I constantly debate what noises a Poro makes!)

Please grant my wish!

<3 OCG LittleKazNz

replies.body:
I don't have the answer to this, but I think RiotEarp should know (since he created them).

I'll bug him for an answer.
I imagine a small barky "poh-rr" sound,

I would very much like that! 

Thank you so much!
Poros aren't real, therefore they don't make any noise.
then explain how santa baron powers his sleigh?
dude makes a valid point, if santa baron isn't real, life isn't real.
Happy Birthday Karin! I am Yitzin's friend!!! (Yrlyaknow)
Hey Kaza! I saw your birthday on FB. Nice to know your IGN again haha. Have a nice one!
Hello! Of course you're welcome to add me on league too!
Happy birthday mine is the day after ;)
